item.title: Sam Altman Under Fire: IRS Complaint, Meta Talent War, and AI Hardware Lawsuit — What’s Behind the Buzz?
item.dc:creator: Ragavendran Ramesh
item.description: Sam Altman is trending across India and the world after an IRS complaint alleges conflict of interest at OpenAI. From Meta’s AI poaching to hardware lawsuits, here’s the full story explained.

item.title: 6G: The Next Leap in Global Connectivity and Innovation
item.dc:creator: Ragavendran Ramesh
item.description: 6G is coming—100x faster than 5G, with holographic calls, AI-powered cities, and 1Tbps speeds. Discover which countries lead the race, how it will transform your life, and when it arrives (hint: by 2030!).

item.title: Neuralink Breakthrough: First Human Patient Draws Using Only His Mind
item.dc:creator: Ragavendran Ramesh
item.description: Noland Arbaugh, the first human with a Neuralink brain implant, draws on a computer using only his mind. Discover how this breakthrough in brain-computer interfaces is transforming lives and reshaping the future of human-AI interaction

item.title: The Godfather of AI Sounds the Alarm: 15 Terrifying Dangers of Artificial Intelligence
item.dc:creator: Ragavendran Ramesh
item.description: Geoffrey Hinton, the 'Godfather of AI', explains 15 real dangers of AI—from job loss and scams to threats to humanity. Learn what must be done now.

item.title: Google I/O 2024: Sundar Pichai on AI, Search, and the Future
item.dc:creator: Ragavendran Ramesh
item.description: A detailed breakdown of Sundar Pichai’s Decoder interview on AI, Google I/O 2024, AR glasses, Gemini, and the evolving future of search and web platforms.
